description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              •	Carry out the development/maintenance of the projects on various platforms.
              
              •	Develop, implement and maintain robust web applications along with services
              
              •	Perform code verification and determine recommendations for adaptation
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Understanding of software development processes and software quality assurance procedures.
              
              •	1+ years of experience in Python and an MVC framework; Django would be an advantage.
              
              •	MUST have experience in following technologies:
              
              	Html, Html5, JavaScript, CSS
              
              	JQuery or some other JavaScript frameworks
              
              •	Ability to work on Apache HTTP Server or other web servers
              
              •	Having experience with relational DB systems
              
              •	Knowledge of open source python components is a plus
              
              •	Work with version control system such as: SVN, Git.
              
              •	Ability to research and use open source components
              
              •	Good English reading and writing skill
              

              * Advantages:
              
              •	Strong interest in MVC architectures
              
              •	The ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced Agile development methodology
              
              •	BS in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Performance bonus
               







                1-2 day-off on Christmas
               







                Company trip once a year
